name: CoagulationAssayPTAPTTFibrinogen
title: Coagulation Assay (PT, aPTT, Fibrinogen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable panel code(s) for Coagulation Assay (PT, aPTT, Fibrinogen).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of Platelet Poor Plasma for Coagulation Assay (PT, aPTT, Fibrinogen).),(Inclusion Criteria: Coagulation Assay (PT, aPTT, Fibrinogen) lab test, using the source of Platelet Poor Plasma, coded in LOINC, using panel codes. LOINC will need to be referenced for the individual laboratory observations associated with these panel codes(s).),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent Coagulation Assay (PT, aPTT, Fibrinogen) as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
